__e: We had to do it, it was the only-
God forbid, anyone around here should be happy, but... you had to have this happen, didn't you?
The people had to believe it... and they did.
I mean, we got all the stuff we ever wanted, and we didn't even have to...
You know, what we've seen, what we've had to do... it's...
Between the Family at night and you in the daytime... shooting at anything that moved, man, we had to stay low.
So they police couldn't help we could only depend on ourselves.
So of course we had to meet again.
You brought that cat all this way and today we had to kill it.
As soon as we'd arrest them, they'd be back on the street.
But she stopped showing up, and we had to kill her.
Everything we've done, everything, is exactly what we had to do.
And I didn't deserve no punishment.
- But did you have to kill it, sir?
Did you really have to kill her?
Maybe they had to start over.
And they weren't long finding it.
And you didn't have to do that.
So you had to find a way to get me to come to you.
And we needed them to believe we had gone.
What did you have to tell the captain I couldn't go along for?
They arrested him but they had to let him go.
We get a job, we got to make good.
! We had to kill him or he'd tell people we tried to kill him.
Imagine what everyone else would think.
You mean you had to cut the...
You had to take matters into your own hands.
We needn't care about whether the school is famous or not
Like it was something we didn't have to worry about for another week or so.
But we never had to worry about that kind of stuff because Mom always knew how to take care of him and us.
